alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 03 at 9:15AM CST until January 03 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 6 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS ASHLEY CHICOT IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST CARROLL MADISON MOREHOUSE RICHLAND WEST CARROLL IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI HOLMES HUMPHREYS YAZOO IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA LEFLORE MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI BOLIVAR SUNFLOWER WASHINGTON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANGUILLA, BASTROP, BELZONI, CARROLLTON, CLEVELAND, CROSSETT, DELHI, DERMOTT, DURANT, EPPS, EUDORA, EUPORA, GOODMAN, GREENVILLE, GREENWOOD, GRENADA, HAMBURG, INDIANOLA, ISOLA, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LAKE VILLAGE, LEXINGTON, MATHISTON, MAYERSVILLE, NORTH CARROLLTON, NORTH CROSSETT, OAK GROVE, PICKENS, RAYVILLE, ROLLING FORK, RULEVILLE, TALLULAH, TCHULA, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, WEST CROSSETT, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
